|1effect=Unit can counterattack before foe's first attack.<br><br>If a skill compares unit's Spd to a foe's or ally's Spd, treats unit's Spd as if granted +7.<br><br>At start of turn, and at start of enemy phase (except for in Summoner Duels), if unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, triggers the following effects: if Special cooldown count is at its maximum value, grants Special cooldown count-1 to unit; grants "reduces the percentage of foe's non-Special 'reduce damage by X%' skills by 50% during combat (excluding area- of-effect Specials)" and【Dodge】to unit and allies within 2 spaces of unit for 1 turn.<br><br>If foe initiates combat or foe's HP ≥ 75% at start of combat, inflicts Atk/Spd/Def-5 on foe during combat, deals damage = 20% of unit's Spd (including area-of-effect Specials; excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials), and reduces damage from foe's attacks by 20% of unit's Spd (including area-of-effect Specials; excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials), and if unit's Special cooldown count is at its maximum value after combat, grants Special cooldown count-1 to unit.<br><br>【Dodge】<br>If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage = difference between stats × 4 (max 40%).
|1cost=300
|1required=-
}}
